description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you identify the colors? It seems simple at first, but looks are deceiving; you think you know what you're doing, until, suddenly, you realize the truth. What is "the rise of yellow?" Can you handle it?   With each level comes enough challenge to test even the most seasoned gamer. Unveil the mystery of Colaris.   Online scoreboards supported.
